name: Show folder on desktop

screenshots.caption: Show folder to desktop offers easy access to a selected folder
When currently not in use Show folder on desktop becomes partially transparent so you can see everything underneath it.

short_description: Just add any folder you choose to the dektop so you can conveniently access the folders content. You can for example easily copy files into that folder or delete files. An ideal usage for this tool could for example be adding your downloads folder to the desktop so that you can conveniently access all files that you recently downloaded. But there are hundreds of other possibilities to use Show folder on desktop.
summary: Adds a folder you choose to the desktop for faster access.
